text: David Reece Bowen (born October 21, 1932) is an American politician. He was born in Houston, Mississippi. Bowen was a U.S. Representative from Mississippi. He served for 2nd congressional district. He served from January 3, 1973 through January 3, 1983. He was a member of the Democratic Party. ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Mississippi Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:20th-century American politicians
title: David R. Bowen
